bio: My name is Jan Krba and I am crypto investor.
contributionDescription:
My favorite RetroPGF is Protocol Guild.
Main goals of this project are:
1) A collective of Ethereum contributors
2) working to boost the incentives around stewarding the core protocol
3) by maintaining an onchain registry of its membership
4) which allows ecosystem sponsors to directly fund the membership, their work, the public good.
impactDescription: I am working on promotion among friends and family, by spreading educational materials, videos and tutorials. I actively participate in crypto presentations and webinars on the Internet and in universities. I believe that crypto currencies will one day replace standard FIAT currencies and we will be freer.
pwCategorySuggestions: Developer Ecosystem, Governance & Tokens, Content Creation
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application is not correctly categorized. The applicant refers to themselves as "I", denoting that the applicant is an individual, not a project.
